title: Q6 Introduction MC
prompt: Which sentence would <u>best</u> open the paragraph to introduce the topic?
description:
Read this paragraph.

The first type, Photorefractive keratectomy, or PRK, involves sanding down the outer layer of the cornea so that a laser can reshape the inner portion of the cornea. The second type, laser epithelial keratomilieusis, or LASEK, involves the creation of a small flap in the outer layer of the cornea through which a laser then reshapes the inner layer of the cornea. In both procedures, the reshaped cornea is able to more sharply focus light on the retina, creating sharper vision without the need for corrective lenses.
feedback: The correct answer is “Of the surgical approaches to correcting impaired vision, there are two main types.” It sets up the discussion of the two specific surgical techniques discussed in the rest of the passage.
